channel.title: Compiler Errors

item.title: Compiler Errors
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

remove the breaks… they are unreachable because your returning before you can reach them…

color 0a
title Allstar-Scape
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Use that for a compiler…

item.title: Compiler Errors
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

I added in this code:

private String getColorForRank()
{
    switch(playerRights)
    {
        case 1:
            return "@blu@"; // If the player is a moderator, their name will be written in blue.
        break;

        case 2:
            return "@yel@"; // If the player is an administrator, their name will be written in yellow.
        break;

        default:
            return "@red@"; // Otherwise, their name will be written in red.
        break;
    }
}

and get this error

client.java:9349: unreachable statement
        break;
        ^
client.java:9353: unreachable statement
        break;
        ^
client.java:9357: unreachable statement
        break;
        ^
client.java:9359: missing return statement
}
^

Read full topic
